name: @pvermeer/dexie-rxjs-addon
description: Addon for Dexie.js database to add rxjs observables
author: PVermeer

scripts.docker:dev:jasmine: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-jasmine build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-jasmine run -p 9229:9229 test-jasmine; docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-jasmine down
scripts.docker:dev:karma: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-karma build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-karma run -p 9339:9229 test-karma; docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -p dev-karma down
scripts.docker:test: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p test build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p test run test; docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p test down
scripts.docker:test:ci: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p test build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p test run test
scripts.docker:build: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.yml -p build build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.yml -p build run build; docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.test.yml -p build down
scripts.docker:build:ci: COMPOSE_DOCKER_CLI_BUILD=1 docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.yml -p build build && docker-compose -f deployments/docker/docker-compose.yml -p build run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:bundles && npm run build:es6 && npm run build:esm-es5 && npm run build:declaration && npm run build:dl-dts
scripts.test: npm run clean:test && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:jasmine && npm run test:karma
scripts.test:coverage: rimraf -rf reports/coverage/ && karma start test/karma.conf.js --browsers ChromeHeadless --reporters dots,coverage-istanbul
